wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.noAccountsWarning: No withdrawal addresses yet, please add one first
wallet.loadWalletFailedRetry: Failed to load wallet information, please retry
wallet.loadChangesFailedRetry: Failed to load transaction records, please retry
wallet.loadWithdrawsFailedRetry: Failed to load withdrawal records, please retry
wallet.withdrawDescription: Please enter withdrawal amount and select withdrawal account
wallet.noWithdrawAccounts: No withdrawal accounts yet, please add one first
wallet.withdrawRemarkPlaceholder: Optional, explain withdrawal purpose or other notes
wallet.withdrawFeeNotice: Withdrawal fee will be deducted from withdrawal amount, actual amount received will be based on blockchain transfer
wallet.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this withdrawal account?
wallet.changesDescription: View all income, withdrawal, and refund records
wallet.withdrawsDescription: Manage and track all withdrawal request statuses
wallet.accountsDescription: Configure withdrawal account addresses and network settings
wallet.accountSecurityDescription: Please ensure the withdrawal address is accurate. Once submitted, funds cannot be recovered. It is recommended to test with a small amount first.
wallet.noAccountsDescription: Add your first withdrawal account to start managing your funds.
wallet.addAccountDescription: Select withdrawal method and fill in payment information, supports cryptocurrency wallets and PayPal.
wallet.paypalGuide: Please enter your PayPal account email. Withdrawals will be sent in USD to your PayPal account. PayPal fees are approximately 3%.
wallet.currencyGuide: Both USDT and USDC are stablecoins pegged 1:1 to USD. If you're unsure which to choose, we recommend USDT as it is currently the most widely used stablecoin.
